name: UNION OF ROMANIAN INLAND PORTS
goal: the Union of Romanian Inland Ports has been established in 2006 by port administrations and port operators from romanian ports along the Danube. The main goals are integration of romanian ports into logistic chains at international level and development of passenger traffic on Danube. To reach these goals tje union perform activities to  develop port business, to uptake inovation in port activties, to improve cooperation between port comunity stakeholders, to improve port labour competences and to improve social dialog
interests: Competition, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
